title: Reports a number of streets in Higher Shotton without electricity
content: Published: Saturday, Jun 2nd, 2018    Share:     A number of streets in Higher Shotton are currently without electricity, several people have been in touch to say Terrig Street, Green Lane, Chevrons Drive to the junction of Clwyd Street.    In an update at 10.15pm Scottish Power who supply electricity in the area has said;    ‘This has been caused by a fault on our network and is affecting a number of properties in the local area.    We will attempt to reset the network to restore your supply remotely. Our Engineers have been dispatched and will work to restore your electricity supply by 00.15AM.    Should this information change on arrival, every effort will be made to keep you updated. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. ’
